description:
Creates a purchase order (or updates it if it already exists).

When the order already exists, only the lines can be updated (see `SupplierUpdatePurchaseOrder`) - other properties will be ignored.

:lightbulb: Using `SupplierCreateOrder` and `SupplierUpdatePurchaseOrder` is preferred.

BackendID.description: Identifer of the order from the 3rd party

BackendSystemID.description: Identifier of the 3rd party system that created the order

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: Date that the supplier expects to deliver the shipment(s) of the purchase order

Receive.description: Receive the order immediately after shipping, works only if `Ship` is set to true

Ship.description: Ship the order immediately after creation

ShipFromOrganizationUnitBackendID.description: BackendID of the OrganizationUnit who will be supplying the stock

deprecated.comment: ShipFromOrganizationUnitBackendID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.687: Replaced by ShipFromOrganizationUnitID..

ShipFromOrganizationUnitID.description: OrganizationUnit who will be supplying the stock.

required.comment: Field ShipFromOrganizationUnitID is required and will be enforced as such in 2.0.687.

requiredAllowEmpty.comment: Field ShipFromOrganizationUnitID is required and will be enforced as such in 2.0.687.

ShipToOrganizationUnitBackendID.description: BackendID of the OrganizationUnit that will be receiving the purchase order shipment(s)

deprecated.comment: ShipToOrganizationUnitBackendID is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.687: Replaced by ShipToOrganizationUnitID..

ShipToOrganizationUnitID.description: OrganizationUnit that will be receiving the purchase order shipment(s).

required.comment: Field ShipToOrganizationUnitID is required and will be enforced as such in 2.0.687.

requiredAllowEmpty.comment: Field ShipToOrganizationUnitID is required and will be enforced as such in 2.0.687.
